resources.string: Logged Data list is empty now, \nmake a USSD call or receive SMS
All permissions are necessary for this application

We need permissions:
 - to send and read SMS; %s
 - make a USSD call.
Please click OK and grant permissions in the following pop-ups.
Please enable Enaza Music accessibility service

We need this service to receive responses from USSD commands.

Please:
1. Click OK and you will be redirected to the accessibility services window.
2. Please turn on the Enaza Music service 
3. And go back to the application.
Thank you! Service is enabled now
This service helps to get the results of USSD calls
It is necessary to enable USSD accessibility service
Download the latest version of the application
Thank you! App installing is enabled now
It is necessary to allow installing apps from our app
Please allow installing apps from our app

It is necessary to install updates of our application.

Please:
1. Click OK and you will be redirected to the Install unknown apps window.
2. Please allow installing from this source.
3. And go back to the application.
New update is not available now
It is necessary to identify a sender of USSD calls.
We defined that your phone number is: %s. Click Change if it is not true
Non-delivered Messages: %d\nLast Transfer Attempt: %s\nLast HTTP Response Code: %d
